'''''Blazing Heart''''' is [[Mavuika]]'s [[Character Trailer]] EP [[soundtrack]] album.

It features 5 tracks produced by [[HOYO-MiX]] that are variations of Mavuika's Character Trailer song, "Blazing Heart". The album was released on January 1, 2025. On January 2, the album was added to YouTube.
